title: Upcoming 2 BR 1.5 BA w/View! Available to View 8/25
app_fee: $40 Application Fee for Credit Check & Processing
posting_body: This beautiful, updated 2nd story two bedroom apartment home with a gorgeous view will include tasteful wall to wall carpet and vinyl flooring; modern appliances, light fixtures, and window treatments; plentiful closets; a fireplace, a private balcony with storage, and gorgeous trees everywhere to provide lovely views wherever you are!
Special touches such as a charming gazebo and beautiful, lush landscape in a beautiful garden setting make Kelly Green Apartments easy to come home to.
This is truly a unique community nestled in the Hayward hills.
We are only minutes away from downtown Hayward’s public library, local movie theater, grocery and retail shopping, and several cafes and restaurants.
We’re also conveniently located near many parks and of course easy highway access!
or email us Monday-Friday from 9am-6pm for viewing and application appointments.
You may also visit us at our website, <URL>
• Walk-in Closets and Fireplaces in Select Units
• Electric Kitchens with Dishwashers & Garbage Disposals
• Close to BART and Several Major Highways
You will love your new home!
Reserve your apartment with your application and holding deposit today!
*Apartment shown in the photos is the actual available unit.
